executiveSummary: Jordan Baroque and Daniel Foglesson, founders of Three Jerks Jerky, pitched their premium filet mignon beef jerky seeking $100,000 for 15% equity. After multiple offers from the Sharks, they accepted a deal with Daymond John for $150,000 in exchange for 33% equity to help scale their premium jerky business nationally.
keyDecisions: The founders accepted Daymond Johnâ€™s offer of $150,000 for 33% equity.
nextSteps: Jordan and Daniel will partner with Daymond John to expand Three Jerks Jerky into national retail chains, optimize production costs, and leverage his distribution network to scale the brand.
